intro_para.intent: I am writing to express my interest in the mechanical engineering fall internship position, which I found through Northeastern's co-op network.
intro_para.reason: I am approaching my fourth year as a BS/MS candidate for Mechanical Engineering with a concentration in Mechatronics and am eager to gain more hands-on experience in new industries.
intro_para.proposition: I believe my previous experience and passion for automation and interdisciplinary work make me an ideal candidate for this role.

para_background.experience: During my time at Portal Instruments, another start up in the area, I worked on a complex electromechanical assembly.
This project involved a lot of independent design, fabrication, and testing, which I believe is not unlike the work I would be doing at Piaggio.
At my last co-op at Bio-Rad, I worked mostly independently on a piece of automation equipment, which involved the integration of mechanical, electrical, and software concepts.

In addition to my work experience, I also participate in AIAA, where I have begun to help with the mechanical design of an RC plane as well as the electrical and software implementation of several components.

para_closing.compatability: My previous supervisors have described me as a self motivated worker with an eagerness to learn, which I believe would make me a great fit for the start up environment of Piaggio.
para_closing.next_step: I would appreciate an opportunity to meet with you to discuss my qualifications in further detail. Thank you for your consideration, and I look forward to speaking with you soon.
